job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-25T17:24:28.000Z", "description": "

Clinical Resource Network (CRN) is working with a growing bi-coastal oncology pharma that has an immediate need for an FTE-based Manager of Statistical Programming. The selected candidate will generate TLGs/reports, create SDTM/ADaM datasets, develop macros, validate output, support ISSs/ISEs, and contribute to in house/outsourced studies. Our client prefers local or quasi local candidates but is open to the right 100% WFH candidate as well.


Essential Duties and Responsibilities:

  • Serve as Leader for all SAS Programming activities
  • Manage resource allocation and budgeting for assigned projects
  • Resolve issues for complex SAS programming duties
  • Interact with global regulatory bodies
  • Collaborate with CRO\u2019s
  • Develop Macros
  • Key contributor in the development of new processes or revision of existing processes.
  • Professional development to enhance knowledge, skills, communication, scientific methodology, operational efficiency, and compliance with policies, regulations, and corporate standards and processes


Required Education and Experience:

  • Bachelor\u2019s degree in Computer Science, Math/Statistics, or related degree
  • 5-7+ years of Clinical Statistical Programming experience in a CRO or sponsor environment
  • Strong TLF, SDTM, and ADaM experience
  • Experience working in a Lead Programming capacity
  • Previous line management experience preferred
  • Previous oncology and/or submissions experience is a major plus, but not required


If this position sounds like a good fit for you, Apply Now!
